decrees.title: Eat the Rich
decrees.description: Redistribute the funds from the Top 1% of Fans at the end of each Season

decrees.title: Eat the Crust
decrees.description: 5 Players from the 2-Time Champion Pies will be reassigned to Random Teams

decrees.title: Late Stage
decrees.description: Postseason Bet Payouts increase each round: 2x, 3x, 5x

bonuses.title: Anticapitalism, brought to you by Friends at the Table
bonuses.description: Your team will become fully anticapitalist.

bonuses.title: Rigour Mortis
bonuses.description: Stiff Limbs. -10% team baserunning to your team's division opponents.

bonuses.title: Evil Wind Sprints
bonuses.description: The Wind can be Evil. Run. +15% Team Baserunning

bonuses.title: Bloodlust
bonuses.description: URRRRRRGGHHHHHH. Maxes the stats of a random player on your team.

bonuses.title: Highway Robbery
bonuses.description: The best player in the league joins your team.

bonuses.title: Headhunter
bonuses.description: The best hitter in your team's subleague (Good or Evil) joins your team.

bonuses.title: Vulture
bonuses.description: The best player in your team's division joins your team.

bonuses.title: Pretty Plz?
bonuses.description: Feed your hitters coffee grounds. Team hitting changes from -5% to +15%

bonuses.title: Team-Building Exercise
bonuses.description: Re-rolls your team's three worst players

bonuses.title: Performance Enhancing Demons
bonuses.description: Mggoka match ng strike fm'latghor. Fm'latgh. +8% Team Overall

bonuses.title: Pseudo-Thumbs
bonuses.description: Pseudo-Thumbs burst from the skin on the opposite of your pitchers' hands. +10% Team Pitching

bonuses.title: Exile
bonuses.description: Send your team's worst hitter to a random other team. Receive a random player back.

bonuses.title: Go Away
bonuses.description: Send your team's worst pitcher to a random team. Receive a random player back.
